room_title: Escape room "Dr. K’s Lethal Injection" by Escape MSP in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: My family and I did the Dr. K room. It was a lot of fun! We made it out with one minute remaining. Eva was our host and she was great too!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. K’s Lethal Injection" by Escape MSP in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Had so much fun here and honestly can not wait to go back! The Dr. K room was very difficult but very fun!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. K’s Lethal Injection" by Escape MSP in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Dr. K's Lethal Injection was a blast! Even though we failed our mission. It was a great activity to do with our teenage daughters. Staff was fantastic. The whole experience was great and we highly recommend this!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. K’s Lethal Injection" by Escape MSP in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Dr. K's lethal injection mission was fun & very challenging! We were told only 17% of the groups make it all the way through and now I know why. It's a great way to spend an hour with friends and family. When we got stuck and were running out of ideas they gave us clues to keep us engaged and moving along with the game.

room_title: Escape room "Dr. K’s Lethal Injection" by Escape MSP in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We were a group of 10 that did Dr. K's Injection Room. We had a blast. The game master was polite and oriented us before we started. The room was challenging and fun! I highly recommend this attraction.
